subject: Re: New member saying hello
author: cat_perks
full_text:
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Frank" <warrior18eii@...> wrote:
>
> One of your fellow countrymen (Lance Reed) came up with a great 
method
> called the light feedback method that has really shown a lot of
> promise. He has posted some examples and the setup over on the
> ITCBridge Forum.
> 
> Link: http://www.itcbridge.com/forum/view_topic.php?
id=156&forum_id=6
> 
> Take a look, he has done a great job.
> 
> Frank
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "cat_perks" <cat_perks@> wrote:
> >
> > A big hello to everyone,
> > I am the founder of the circle uk evp group
> > I have been recording Evp and capturing images for awhile now
> > Mind you i seem now to be hitting a blank wall with my images 
these 
> > past few months as i am working on a transparent method in the 
loop
> > Frustration can be an understatment on bad days,lol.
> > So i thought i would get a wee bit of advice on these other 
techniques 
> > people are now using,I also work with water and results there 
seem to 
> > be getting on fine.
> > I am not very techie minded although i try:-)
> > On the Evp side of things i have no problems as i get good/bad 
days 
> > like anyone else.
> > 
> >   Take Care
> >   Cat:-)
> >
>

  Hello Frank,
I know Lance he is in our circle group:-)
Yes i have seen his images and they are fab
I am still finding my way round this new yahoo group
So hopefully i have replied in the proper area

Take Care
Cat:)
